task.title: How to invite users
task.shortdesc: Here you will get instructions about how to invite users.

taskbody.prereq:
To successfully invite users
You must be logged into the application.
Have permission to invite new members to the workspace or project.

step.cmd: Enter email and choose a role: Admin, Contributor, Viewer.

example.p: You invite @Ravi from Finance as a Viewer to track task progress during budget planning, without giving edit access.
